titles.title: To suspend for the period January 1, 1994, to April 30, 1994, the duty on frozen onions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/10/1994--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through April 30, 1994, the duty on frozen onions.
